title: No, That’s Not a ‘Demon’ in Italy – It’s a Digital Creation
subtitle: Demon Bird in Italy Fact Check: A video which shows a creature on top of a dome like structure has created confusion among users on social media. Many people are sharing this video with a claim that it shows a “demon bird in Italy”.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video which shows a creature on top of a dome-like structure has created confusion among users on social media. Many people are sharing this video with a claim that it shows a “demon bird in Italy”.

The message has been shared with multiple claims, one of which reads, “Appearance of devil top of church in Italy some days ago”.
